issue_name: Improper Privilege Management Vulnerability in Mendix Runtime

1.command: Update to V9.24.22 or later version
1.description: Update Mendix 9 applications to version 9.24.22 or later.

2.command: Update to V10.11.0 or later version
2.description: Update Mendix 10 applications to version 10.11.0 or later.

3.command: Update to V10.6.9 or later version
3.description: Update Mendix 10 (V10.6) applications to version 10.6.9 or later.

4.command: Set the runtime setting ‘StrictReferenceChecks‘ to false
4.description: Set the runtime setting ‘StrictReferenceChecks‘ to false to reduce the risk, but note that this makes the reference checks less secure.
